Framework.Title: Ecoprovinces of Canada
Framework.Abstract: Ecoprovinces are the second highest level of the Terrestrial Ecostratification of Canada.

Dataset.Title: Surface Material
Dataset.Abstract: Surface material presented as a set of components within each polygon. This information was summarized from SLC version 2.2.

Attribute.Title: Surface Material
Attribute.Abstract: Material found at the earth's surface. Five classes, including soil, organic, rock, ice, urban.

Classes.Title: SLC Surface Material classes
Classes.Abstract: Five classes that differentiate the principle kinds of surfaces mapped at the SLC level of abstraction.

Value.Title: Organic soil
Value.Abstract: Contains > 30% organic matter as measured by weight

Value.Title: Mineral soil
Value.Abstract: Predominantly mineral particles: contains less than 30% organic matter as measured by weight

Value.Title: Urban
Value.Abstract: Urban areas. Note that only a few major urban area polygons are included on SLC source maps, therefore, do not use for tabulating total urban coverage
